Auxiliary

Enum Orientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
      • Auxiliary.Orientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Orientation>

    @Value
public enum Orientation
extends java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
    An enumeration introducing different orientations. For the moment, this class knows the orientations Up, Down, Left & Right.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Brecht Gosselé & William Mauclet 2BiR: wtk-cws (Gosselé) en cws-elt(Mauclet)

        public static Orientation getOrientation(int intOrientation)
        ...
        Parameters:
        intOrientation - ...
        Returns:
        ... |let | Orientation resultOrientation= Orientation.UP | intOrientation = standardizeIntOrientation(intOrientation) | for each orientation in Orientation.values() : | if(intOrientation == orientation.getIntOrientation()) | then resultOrientation = orientation |in | result == resultOrientation

      • getNbTurnsNecessary

        public static int getNbTurnsNecessary(Orientation orientation1,
                      Orientation orientation2)
        ...
        Parameters:
        orientation1 - ...
        orientation2 - ...
        Returns:
        ... |if(orientation1 == orientation2) then result == 0 |if(orientation1 == Orientation.opposite(orientation2)) then result == 2 |else then result == 1
